hu.szabot.transloadit

Interface ITransloadit

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Transloadit

    public interface ITransloadit
    Interface for accessing Transloadit services

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransloaditResponse deleteAssembly(java.lang.String assemblyID)
      Tries to delete an assembly by the specified assembly ID.
      TransloaditResponse invokeAssembly(IAssemblyBuilder assembly)
      Tries to create the specified assembly on Transloadit.
      TransloaditRequest request()
      Creates and gets a new TransloaditRequest instance with default attributes
      TransloaditResponse requestAndExecute(TransloaditRequest request)
      Creates then tries to proceed the specified or a default request, then executes this and gets the response of it.
      void useSignature(java.lang.String secret)
      Sets API Secret code of the current Transloadit user.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteAssembly

        TransloaditResponse deleteAssembly(java.lang.String assemblyID)
        Tries to delete an assembly by the specified assembly ID.
        Parameters:
        assemblyID - ID of the assembly which will be tried to be deleted
        Returns:
        Represents the whole result of the request.

      • invokeAssembly

        TransloaditResponse invokeAssembly(IAssemblyBuilder assembly)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Tries to create the specified assembly on Transloadit. Bored instance is requested at first. If there is one, then it will be used to proceed the request, which can be completed on a bored instance.
        Parameters:
        assembly - Specified assembly which will be tried to be created.
        Returns:
        Represents the whole result of the request.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.io.IOException

      • request

        TransloaditRequest request()
        Creates and gets a new TransloaditRequest instance with default attributes
        Returns:
        TransloaditRequest instance with default attributes

      • requestAndExecute

        TransloaditResponse requestAndExecute(TransloaditRequest request)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates then tries to proceed the specified or a default request, then executes this and gets the response of it.
        Parameters:
        request - Optional request which will be tried to be executed
        Returns:
        Represents the whole result of the request.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - Thrown if the URI not valid.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when I/O error occurred in the communication.

      • useSignature

        void useSignature(java.lang.String secret)
        Sets API Secret code of the current Transloadit user. This code is used for each request if signature authentication is enabled
        Parameters:
        secret - The secret key, or NULL to not use signature.
